question.body: Which of the following statements is correct?

multiple_choice.choice: Coagulation is a series of three major activities.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Coagulation is one of the three major activities that make up hemostasis.
Correct. Coagulation is one of the major activities of hemostasis, but it can occur and form clots in unwanted places such as the coronary arteries. In this case it is not preventing blood loss.
Incorrect. Hemostasis consists of three main activities of which coagulation is one.
Incorrect. Vasoconstriction is one of the three main activities of hemostasis and occurs before coagulation.
